about_the_game:
This is the free demo for Nectarmare, a hectic arcade-like game about a honeybee collecting nectar and avoiding danger.

This demo contains a sample of six insect-themed levels and the modes of Story and Challenge, have fun and consider buying the full game.
detailed_description:
This is the free demo for Nectarmare, a hectic arcade-like game about a honeybee collecting nectar and avoiding danger.

This demo contains a sample of six insect-themed levels and the modes of Story and Challenge, have fun and consider buying the full game.
name: Nectarmare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 19043-1348
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i74700MQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GT 750/2GB GDDR5
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 22631.3007
  • Processor: Intel(7) i710750
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce RTX 30
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Nectarmare demo, a free sample of some of awesome insect-themed levels of fun.
